mapper.select: SELECT KC.kids_class_cd AS kidsClassCd , KC.class_nm AS classNm , CF.kids_cd AS kidsCd , K.kids_nm AS kidsNm , K.kids_date_of_birth AS kidsDateOfBirth , K.kids_address AS kidsAddress , K.kids_parent_phone AS kidsParentPhone , K.kids_spare_phone AS kidsSparePhone , K.kids_gender AS kidsGender , K.kids_commuting_type AS kidsCommutingType , K.kids_caution AS kidsCaution , K.kids_admission AS kidsAdmission , K.kids_graduation AS kidsGraduation FROM TB_KIDS_CLASS_FORMATION CF INNER JOIN TB_KIDS_CLASS KC ON CF.KIDS_CLASS_CD = KC.KIDS_CLASS_CD INNER JOIN TB_KIDS K ON K.KIDS_CD = CF.KIDS_CD WHERE KC.class_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT KC.kids_class_cd AS kidsClassCd , KC.class_nm AS classNm , KCF.kids_cd AS kidsCd , K.kids_nm AS kidsNm , K.kids_gender AS kidsGender , T.teacher_cd AS teacherCd , T.teacher_nm AS teacherNm FROM TB_KIDS_CLASS_FORMATION KCF INNER JOIN TB_KIDS_CLASS KC ON KCF.kids_class_cd = KC.kids_class_cd INNER JOIN TB_KIDS K ON K.kids_cd = KCF.kids_cd INNER JOIN TB_TEACHER_CLASS_FORMATION TCF ON TCF.kids_class_cd = KCF.kids_class_cd INNER JOIN TB_TEACHERS T ON T.teacher_cd = TCF.teacher_cd WHERE T.teacher_cd = #{teacherCd}

SELECT kids_cd AS kidsCd ,kids_nm AS kidsNm ,kids_date_of_birth AS kidsDateOfBirth ,kids_address AS kidsAddress ,kids_parent_phone AS kidsParentPhone ,kids_spare_phone AS kidsSparePhone ,kids_gender AS kidsGender ,kids_commuting_type AS kidsCommutingType ,kids_caution AS kidsCaution ,kids_admission AS kidsAdmission ,kids_graduation AS kidsGraduation FROM hanboa.TB_KIDS WHERE kids_cd = #{kidsCd}
